Title: Limits the application of the "safe act" to the counties of Kings, Queens, Richmond, New York and Bronx; repealer
Summary: Limits the application of the "safe act" to the counties of Kings, Queens, Richmond, New York and Bronx.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, the family court act, the domestic relations law, the general business law, the judiciary law, the mental hygiene law, the penal law and the surrogate's court procedure act, in relation to limiting the application of certain provisions of law relating to firearms to the counties of Kings, Queens, Richmond, New York and Bronx; and to repeal section 400.02 of the penal law relating to the statewide license and record database
